item.title: Our biggest questions about ChromeOS and Android merging
item.description: Sameer Samat, Google’s head of Android ecosystems, recently confirmed that Android and ChromeOS will be merged into a single platform, reigniting a slew of questions about the future of the operating

item.title: 10 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find those worth your money.
